name: Spooky Time
description:
A 2D platformer where you play as different characters in different worlds to once again reunite. Explore these worlds and you might come across an interesting discovery.

Interactions are simple as jumping, walking and shooting bones to navigate your player around the level. There will be interesting creatures that you will meet during your time in the spooky cave.

Credits:

Visual Artist: Clinton Thai

Coder: Clinton Thai

Music: music is sampled from Escape Port by ASTROBUNNY and Lolo Zouai type beat Sabrina Claudio instrumental "in" by Vile Sky and rendered on GarageBand
